thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Maxlinear Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.29

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Maxlinear Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.29
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Maxlinear Inc:
* MAXLINEAR, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.29 * Q4 REVENUE $113.7 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $110 MILLION TO $114 MILLION * SEES Q1 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN OF APPROXIMATELY 55% AND 63%, RESPECTIVELY
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $114.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $116.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
